action_modal.message_placeholder: Hapụ aha gị na nkọwa ọ bụla, arịrịọ ekpere, ajụjụ, wdg...
action_modal.questions_text: Biko dejupụta fọm dị n'okpuru na ajụjụ ma ọ bụ nkọwa ọ bụla ị nwere ike ịnwe. Jide n'aka na ị ga-elele vidiyo ndị akwadoro na ibe isi.
action_modal.questions_title: Olee otú anyị nwere ike isi nyere aka?
action_modal.saved_text_end: Ọ bụrụ na ị ga-achọ ị nweta na n'onwe gị ka anyị mara na ị zọpụtara taa, biko dejupụta fọm n'okpuru. Ọ ga-amasị anyị ịnụ n'ọnụ gị!
action_modal.saved_text_start: Ugbu a echekwara gị, usoro na-esote bụ:
action_modal.whitelisted_languages: Biko mara na anyị nwere ike ịzaghachi naanị asụsụ ndị a ugbu a:

watch_video: Lelee ugbu a ka ijide n'aka na ị na-aga eluigwe
